author: Staff Reporter
text:
A four-day exhibition on ‘Women’s Health’ (Penne Nalama) is on at Gem Hospital and Research Centre in the city to create awareness on women’s health and wellness.

According to Praveen Raj, Head of the Department of Obesity and Diabetes at the hospital, the idea behind the event is to create awareness among the women regarding their health. Contests are also organised on these four days for school and college students. The possibilities of cancer occurrence were also explained and the exhibition also highlighted how women have fought cancer successfully.

The event was inaugurated by former High Court Judge Justice K.B.K. Vasuki on Thursday.
title: Exhibition on Women’s Health
